item.title: Angular 4 - create an accordion
item.description: After looking for a while for a simple accordion component on npm I was very surprised not to find any. So I began implementing my own. To create the accordion I used two components AccordionComponent and AccordionGroupComponent and organised it in the usual component based architecture.
